column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Right when we arrived
column2: we could get the cool vibe emerging from the place. First off
column3: a few people were conversing outside waiting on their pizza. The conversations and laughter coming out the little crowd made us thing the we were off for a good start. We got in and put ourselves on the waiting list for a table. There is an option on putting your order in online while waiting on your table to reduce the wait time; however
column4: since it was our first time there
column5: we didn't want to risk it. So we waited about 30-45 minutes.
